text: The Last Victim () is a 1975 Soviet movie directed by Pyotr TodorovskyЛионелла Пырьева: «Сколько себя помню, мечтала стать артисткой!»ПОСЛЕДНЯЯ ЖЕРТВА and stars Margarita Volodina, Oleg Strizhenov, and Mikhail Gluzsky. == Actors == * Margarita Volodina as Yuliya Pavlovna Tugina * Oleg Strizhenov as Vadim Dulchin * Mikhail Gluzsky as Flor Fedulych * Leonid Kuravlyov as Lavr Mironych Pribytkov * Olga Naumenko as Irina Lavrovna Pribytkova * Vladimir Kenigson as Salay Saltanych Banvar * Valeri Filatov as Luka Gerasimovich Dergachyov * Maria Vinogradova as Mikheyevna * Pavel Vinnik as Kislovsky == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1975 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Pyotr Todorovsky
title: The Last Victim (1975 movie)
